body: Needs another after story where she goes through with the after exam thing and the kids sick is bigger than the guy she's cheating with and she falls hard for him and he finds out that it was her in the videos and dumps her just for her to fall into dispair

When he graduates and gets his secure, high-paying job, he can easily drop her, thank her for the food, and find a real girlfriend.
